price: Kun ajaja Rabbii kan gara keessanitti isa buuseedha. Nama Rabbiin sodaatu (Rabbiin) badiilee isaa isa irraa harcaasa mindaas isaaf guddisa.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ أَنزَلَهُۥٓ إِلَيۡكُمۡۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يُكَفِّرۡ عَنۡهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُعۡظِمۡ لَهُۥٓ أَجۡرًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: dhālika amru al-lahi anzalahu ilaykum waman yattaqi al-laha yukaffir ʿanhu sayyiātihi wayuʿ'ẓim lahu ajran
